summary: Implements a complete in‑memory mock of the AWS Glue service, defining exception types, validation utilities for the schema registry, parsers for partition filter expressions, data models for Glue resources, and a response layer that exposes the full set of Glue API operations for creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, and managing crawlers, databases, jobs, tables, partitions, schemas, registries, triggers, sessions and tags.
business_intent: Allows developers to run automated tests and develop locally against a simulated Glue environment, avoiding real AWS calls while preserving the behavior and error handling of the actual service.
